name: Simple FPS Game
description:
Arrow Keys to look around, WASD to move.

Enemies will be added, but there aren't any right now.

In the zip folder, there is a file called fps game, when opened, it says that it could be dangerous, this is because the file isn't signed, (whatever that means) but it is safe to use. (click more info, and then run anyway)

(it's gonna be a bit before I make the next update because I have to remake it because the engine I'm using can save games as files that it can't read, and I saved it as that)
